import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Plus, Target, Calendar, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; import { mockGoals } from '../utils/mockData'; const Goals = () => { const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const GoalCard = ({ goal }) => { const monthsRemaining = Math.ceil( (new Date(goal.targetDate) - new Date()) / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 30) ); return (

{goal.title}

Target: ₹{goal.targetAmount.toLocaleString()}

{monthsRemaining} months left
Progress {goal.progress}%

Current Amount

₹{goal.currentAmount.toLocaleString()}

Monthly SIP

₹{goal.monthlyInvestment.toLocaleString()}

Target: {new Date(goal.targetDate).toLocaleDateString('en-IN', { month: 'short', year: 'numeric' })}
); }; return (

Financial Goals

Set and track your investment goals

{/* Goals Grid */}
{mockGoals.map((goal) => ( ))}
{/* Investment Suggestions */}

Investment Suggestions

Conservative

Low risk, steady returns

  • • Fixed Deposits
  • • Government Bonds
  • • Debt Mutual Funds

Moderate

Balanced risk and returns

  • • Hybrid Mutual Funds
  • • Blue-chip Stocks
  • • Index Funds

Aggressive

High risk, high returns

  • • Growth Stocks
  • • Equity Mutual Funds
  • • Sector ETFs
{/* Add Goal Modal */} {showAddModal && (
setShowAddModal(false)} />

Create New Goal

)}
); }; export default Goals;
